summary: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On first day he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?
cast: Jack O'Connell|Gilly Gilchrist|Frederick Schmidt|Edna Caskey|Darren Hart|Raphael Sowole|Duncan Airlie James|Anthony Welsh|David Ajala|Jerome Bailey|Basil Abdul-Latif|Ben Mendelsohn|Matt Faris|Aisha Bywaters|Sam Spruell|David Avery|Tommy McDonnell|James Doran|Ian Beattie|C.C. Smiff|Rupert Friend|Gershwyn Eustache Jnr|Ashley Chin|Sian Breckin|Mark Asante|Paul Lewis Ferguson|Peter Ferdinando|Jonathan Asser|Paddy Rocks|Ryan McKenna|Anthony Adjekum|Amma Boateng|Trevor Adams|Neil Brownlee|Sanjay Ghosh|Hugh Irvine|Shane McCaffrey|Gerald McMullan|Graeme Peacock|Craig Stafford|Michael Stuart|Taylor Topal
title: Convicto (Starred Up)
